sen.j: 社寺局（しゃじきょく）は、明治政府の一局である。
sen.e: Bureau of shrines and temples was one of the bureaus of the Meiji government.

sen.j: 神社および寺院、天理教や黒住教などの新宗教を含めて、宗教に関する全ての行政を管掌した。
sen.e: The bureau took charge of all administrations relating to religions, including shrines and temples, and new religions such as Tenrikyo and Kurozumikyo sects.

sen.e: In 1877 after Kyobusho (Ministry of Religion) was discontinued, the bureau came under the jurisdiction of the prewar Ministry of Home Affairs (Japan).
